definition.text: Trading Parameters determine key aspects of how the trading session is run. Let's take a quick, superficial look...

paragraphs.text: Session Base Asset: no capital is assigned in BTC.
Session Quoted Asset: 1000 USDT of initial capital.
Time Range: we'll test a single day, 2020-09-01.
Time Frame: orders are placed/canceled every minute, thus 01-min is appropriate.
Slippage: it's irrelevant for this case, as this particular trading system uses limit orders only.
Fee Structure: 0.1% is the lower Binance tier.
The remaining parameters do not affect the simulation. To learn more about Trading Parameters, take a look at the documentation.
